attributes.action: Protect Internet Radio From Excessive Royalty Charges & Eventual Closure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In a recent news bulletin advertised on an Internet Radio Station that the US CRB & RIAA have decided to increase the royalties charged to these companies, that will push many into bankruptcy.
In effect shutting them down and depriving many UK & European listeners  from having the choice of listening to internet radio rather than the poor quality of FM broadcasts available at the moment. I petition the UK government to look into this matter and protect our choice.
